description.value: You know the secrets of moving in your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Favored Terrain]. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to skill checks to move within your favored terrain, such as Acrobatics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Balance] on ice, Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Swim] in rough water, Acrobatics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Fly] in windy conditions, and so forth.
